data.title: Mindscape
data.text:
Services

Looking for specialist technical assistance?

Mindscape offers consulting services aimed at delivering technical knowledge and assistance to your business.

Our services include:

Software Architecture and Design

Performance and Load Analysis

Technical Consulting

Technical Training

We would love to discuss your specific needs, so please contact us today! For more detail on our service offering you can read more details below.

Software Architecture and Design

Before you build Rome, you need a solid foundation to build on; Software is no different. Great software comes from a solid architecture and from being built in an environment that allows its design to be evolved by the team.

We can help you:

Elaborate your software design

Review the design your existing solution

Look for opportunities to improve maintainability of your solution

Performance and Load Analysis

Scale is not just about “throwing more hardware” at the problem!

You need to build up a profile of how your software is operating and what causes it to generate load. Once you have this picture there are often re-factoring’s you can apply to help achieve a better result.

We can help you:

Build a profile of your solution to highlight bottlenecks

Recommend a plan of action

Technical Consulting

Do you have a technical problem you “just can’t solve”? Not a problem, chances are, we can help you solve it! Our team comprises of some of the top technical specialists in the country, and we love to solve new problems.

We can help you:

Work through specialist technical problems on the Microsoft platform

Technical Training

It’s a ever changing landscape out there, particularly when it comes to new ways to solve old problems.

We can help train your team on subjects such as:
